original_title: The King of East 85th Street (B/T York and 1st Ave.)
overview: Amir, a young proletariat, seeks to escape from the mundanities and limitations of his degrading job as an apartment super. In his quest for something better, Amir is forced to face the harsh realities of his solitary existence.
title: The King of East 85th Street (B/T York and 1st Ave.)
